channel.title: Need help please
channel.description:
I got a Problem with a COmpiler ( Orginal Tread)
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436600.0.html
I got Jdk1.6.0_25
If i Set The java to mine's and if i Click on the Compile.bat It says:
I also got Teamviewer 7 And i Got Skype
[code=cpp] [Select]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/MainCaused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. [/code]

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“nietmeer, post:3, topic:430034”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=532715.msg3893784#msg3893784 date=1327138565]
There’s a server help section to post this in. This section is ment to post tutorials in it.
[/quote]
i know i posted there but no one’s helping me…[/quote]
You need to wait patiently and make an organized thread.

Read full topic
